description: Dive into the world of engaging web experiences with articles on crafting interactive websites, creating dynamic weather applications, and optimizing animations without keyframes. Learn strategies for sustainable web development and explore the future of CSS beyond 2024. From rethinking personas to managing accessibility challenges, this collection highlights practical techniques and innovative approaches to enhance both performance and user experience.
joke: Why did the developer go broke? Because they kept using promises for all their code and never resolved any.
challenge: Create an interactive 3D weather dashboard using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Simulate different weather conditions like sunny, rainy, and snowy days by leveraging native WebGL or Canvas APIs. Add interactivity, such as toggling between weather types or adjusting intensity levels, to make your application feel immersive and engaging.
